page.title: 05THE OLD FORGE
page.content: The old forge was originally built in 1866 of brick and tile.The two old fireplaces are still there, though there are quite a few loose bricks. There is a big section that has double doors and a wooden exit door at the back of the forge. In the second section there are double doors that lead out to the front and a door that leads into the bigger part. There are two stables, the horses were kept there while waiting to be shod. There are three rings, the horses were tied to them while they were being shod. At the end of the forge it says the builders initials which are E.C. The forge is not used for its original purpose but as a store.
